name: Fares
description: Retrieve all available fares per fare family for a specific Origin & Destination on a given date

catalogues.description: Search fares from these carriers' catalogues - currently active for Germanwings only  (4U)

carriers.description: Include fares for these carriers e.g. ('4U;LH')

Accept.description: http header: application/json or application/xml (Acceptable values are: "application/json", "application/xml")

travelers.description: Type and number of travelers e.g. (adult=1;child=1;infant=1)

fare-types.description: Fares family: basic,smart, best, smartflex, bestflex - Germanwings only (Acceptable values are: "", "basic", "smart", "best", "smartflex", "bestflex")
